text: The BJP tried to put on a brave face when its former allies, DMDK and MDMK, forged an alliance, declaring that it would cobble a larger alliance of several smaller parties for the Assembly elections in Tamil Nadu. The BJP’s election in-charge for the State and Environment Minister, Prakash Javadekar, said the party would be going to the polls as “BJP-plus.” PAGE 13
title: BJP puts on brave face
